 Play Instructions
   ~~~~~~~~~~~~
  
 1> Install the game - Full Installation.                            
 2> Physically Disable/Unhook any available CD-ROM/DVD-ROM/Writers,or deactivate 
    optical IDE drive(s) in device manager  
 3> Mount the poseden_MAXI_NWN2.mds Maxi-Image in DAEMON Tools v4.06. 
 4> Play the Game!
